price: Sizinle savaşanlarla, Allah yolunda siz de savaşın, (fakat) aşırı gitmeyin. Doğrusu Allah aşırı gidenleri sevmez.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡتَدُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi alladhīna yuqātilūnakum walā taʿtadū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
